long_description: This durable cooking pot also serves as a handy storage container--locking lid keeps contents from spilling. Dual purpose handle/lid lock flips up and over the fitted lid to securely lock the lid in place during transport. Includes fitted lid with its own top handle. Scratch and dent resistant stainless steel stands up in the most rugged conditions. Rounded corners help heat travel up sides of pot more quickly, boosting efficiency.
short_description: This durable cooking pot also serves as a handy storage container--locking lid keeps contents from spilling.
